name: Forest of the Magic Lamp
description:
Controls

WASD - Move the older brother

IJKL - Move the younger sister

P - Pause the game

The older brother is stronger and can push boxes by walking into them to help advance. The younger sister is nimbler and can crawl with K and wall jump. She can also jump on the brother for a small height boost.

The siblings are scared of the dark and will force you to restart if they leave the light! Let the brother hold the lantern with Q or let the sister hold it with U. You may also use those keys to drop it, but don't stray too far away. 

Additional Notes This game was made over 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. The theme of the jam was Joined Together. All assets used in the game were created during the jam. Thank you to GMTK and the hosts for leading this event!

The Team

Steven - Character art and Animation

Sun - Environment art and level design

Farchi - Programming

Hall - Programming

Simoris - Programming

Latona - Music and SFX (https://linktr.ee/latona)

Known Bugs 

- Restarting from the last checkpoint from the pause menu will freeze the game. Pressing restart again will fix this.

- Dying will play two instances of the level music. Try your best to make it through deathless
